    • Method Detail

      • convertDistanceToMotorRotation

        public static int convertDistanceToMotorRotation(double wheelRadius,
                                                 double distance)
        Conversion from desired travel distance to motor rotation angle (tacho count)
        Parameters:
        wheelRadius - radius of the wheels
        distance - distance to travel
        Returns:
        number of degrees the motor should travel to match the desired distance

      • convertAngleToMotorRotation

        public static int convertAngleToMotorRotation(double wheelRadius,
                                              double width,
                                              double angle)
        Translates a desired rotation of the robot around its center to a number of degrees each wheel should turn
        Parameters:
        wheelRadius - the radius of the wheel
        width - width of the wheel base, or distance between the wheels
        angle - the angle the robot should rotate in radians
        Returns:
        the angle a motor should travel for the robot to rotate
